item.title: 德国之声记者因侮辱土耳其总统被捕
item.description: 土耳其一家法院以侮辱总统雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安的罪名，正式逮捕了德国国家资助的广播机构德国之声土耳其语频道记者阿里坎·乌卢达格。【原文：A Turkish court has formally arrested Alican Uludag, a correspondent for the Turkish service of Germany’s state-funded broadcaster Deutsche Welle, on a charge of insulting President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.】

item.title: 对冲基金费马表示，巨灾债券销售激增令人瞠目结舌
item.description: 费马资本管理公司的联合创始人表示，灾难债券市场正以他前所未见的增速吸引着新发行方加入。【原文：The co-founder of Fermat Capital Management says the market for catastrophe bonds is drawing in new issuers at a rate that’s unlike anything he’s seen before.】

item.title: 美国盘前活跃股：Akamai、Grail、Hudbay、Newmont、Opendoor
item.description: 截至纽约时间上午7点42分，标普500指数期货下跌0.2%，交易员正评估中东冲突的潜在影响，同时等待一系列美国经济数据的发布。【原文：S&P 500 Index futures decline 0.2% as of 7:42 a.m. in New York as traders assessed the potential impact of conflict in the Middle East and awaited a slate of US economic data.】

item.title: 南非奶业公司称牛病毒应对措施"一团糟"
item.description: 南非政府为遏制口蹄疫疫情而对乳制品行业实施的限制措施，正使该行业面临严重风险，该国一家领先的乳制品公司如是说。【原文：Restrictions placed on the dairy industry by the South African government to curb an outbreak of foot-and-mouth disease places it at serious risk, said one of the country’s leading dairy companies.】

item.title: 标普对EA债券发出高评级信号，债务人偿付风险浮现
item.description: 标普全球评级已私下向部分投资者透露，可能对艺电公司15亿美元债券授予高评级，此举将有效阻止债务投资者获得丰厚的收购溢价。【原文：S&P Global Ratings has signaled to some investors privately that it may grant a high-grade rating to $1.5 billion of Electronic Arts bonds, a move that would effectively block debt investors from a lucrative buyout premium.】

item.title: 印度央行称贸易协定将发挥重要经济作用
item.description: 印度央行表示，该国与欧盟和美国达成的贸易协议已改变投资者情绪，并将长期提振印度的增长前景。【原文：India’s trade deals with the European Union and the US have led to a change in investor sentiment and will boost India’s growth prospects in the long run, the country’s central bank said.】

item.title: 印度利率制定者暂停加息，因通胀温和且经济增长强劲
item.description: 印度货币政策委员会在本月初的会议上决定暂停加息，认为当前利率水平合理，并为此前降息措施传导至借贷成本留出更多时间。【原文：India’s monetary policy panel decided at its meeting earlier this month to pause, judging the current interest appropriate and allowing more time for the past cuts to feed through to borrowing costs.】

item.title: 南非银行首次发行救助债券筹集3.22亿美元
item.description: 南非最大贷款机构筹集了3.22亿美元的新增损失吸收债务，以符合央行制定的框架要求。该框架旨在确保陷入困境的金融机构能够在无需纳税人救助的情况下获得资本重组。【原文：South Africa’s biggest lenders raised $322 million in new loss-absorbing debt to comply with a central bank framework designed to ensure failing financial institutions can be recapitalized without taxpayer bailouts.】

item.title: 巴西国有企业对金矿资产出售给CMOC提出异议
item.description: 巴西一家国有企业正采取法律行动，试图阻止Equinox Gold Corp.将其贵金属资产出售给中国最大矿业公司之一。【原文：A Brazilian state-run company is taking legal action to try to block the sale of a precious metals asset by Equinox Gold Corp. to one of China’s biggest miners.】

item.title: 紧张的巴黎峰会令西方能源联盟摇摇欲坠
item.description: 美国威胁称，若国际能源署不放弃其净零排放目标，将退出该组织。【原文：US threatens to quit IEA if it doesn’t ditch its net-zero dreams.】

item.title: 盎格鲁黄金公司受金价上涨推动，利润激增并创下股息纪录
item.description: 盎格鲁黄金阿桑蒂公司去年利润激增160%，这家矿业公司在黄金价格创纪录上涨期间扩大了产量。【原文：AngloGold Ashanti Plc’s profit jumped 160% last year as the miner expanded production amid bullion’s record-breaking rally.】

item.title: 风投公司争抢人工智能人才以增强投资实力
item.description: 新员工应最大限度地利用该技术。【原文：New hires are expected to maximize the use of the technology】

item.title: 美国新债务预测凸显"厄运循环"情景
item.description: 最新数据显示，美国借贷规模正攀升至令人担忧的水平。【原文：The latest projections for US borrowing show debt climbing to worrying levels.】

item.title: 富兰克林·坦普尔顿瞄准5000亿美元养老金体系
item.description: 资产管理巨头富兰克林邓普顿将墨西哥5000亿美元的养老金体系视为该国基础设施建设的潜在合作伙伴。【原文：Asset management behemoth Franklin Templeton sees Mexico’s $500 billion pension fund system as a potential partner in building up the country’s infrastructure.】

item.title: 新泽西州公共交通乘客遭遇通勤噩梦：简单通勤变身数小时煎熬
item.description: 丹尼·怀尔德是美国职业棒球大联盟曼哈顿办公室的数字运营高级协调员，他正经历着堪称通勤噩梦的煎熬。【原文：Danny Wild is a senior coordinator for digital operations at Major League Baseball’s office in Manhattan and he’s experiencing what can best be described as commuter misery.】

item.title: 利安德巴塞尔削减股息，称市场环境严峻
item.description: 利安德巴塞尔工业公司将第四季度股息削减近半，这家化工制造商称市场环境充满挑战。【原文：LyondellBasell Industries NV slashed its fourth-quarter dividend by almost half as the chemical maker cited challenging market conditions.】

item.title: 非洲欧元债券销售创2013年以来最强劲开局
item.description: 撒哈拉以南非洲国家发行的欧元债券创下十余年来最强劲的年度开局，各国正利用较低的借贷成本以及投资者寻求分散美国资产的投资需求。【原文：Eurobond issuance from sub-Saharan African countries is off to the strongest start to a year in more than a decade, as nations take advantage of lower borrowing costs and demand from investors diversifying out of US assets.】

item.title: 莫迪混乱的人工智能峰会凸显印度影响力与局限
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉·莫迪本周在汇聚全球科技巨头的会议上发表演说，宣称印度能在人工智能浪潮中发挥引领作用。但这场活动却遭遇了诸多波折。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi made his pitch this week that India can play a leading role in the artificial intelligence boom with a conference featuring tech stars from around the world. It suffered more than a few hitches.】

item.title: 债券怀疑论者认为美联储2026年几乎无需降息
item.description:
景顺和嘉明表示，经济形势过于强劲，不足以支撑两次降息。

【原文：

Invesco, Carmignac say the economy is too strong to justify two interest-rate cuts.

】

item.title: 阿尔法橡胶首席执行官ICG据称将合作推进10亿欧元收购计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Alfa Gomma SpA首席执行官已与资产管理公司ICG Plc联手，准备对这家意大利工业集团提出联合收购要约，其估值可能超过10亿欧元（约合12亿美元）。【原文：Alfa Gomma SpA’s chief executive officer has teamed with asset manager ICG Plc to prepare a joint offer for the Italian industrial group that could value it at more than €1 billion ($1.2 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 图洛石油与嘉能可及部分债券持有人达成再融资协议
item.description: 图洛石油公司已与部分债券持有人及贷款方嘉能可能源英国有限公司达成协议，该协议将使这家专注于非洲市场的能源公司得以推迟迫在眉睫的债务偿还，并增强其流动性。【原文：Tullow Oil Plc has reached an agreement with some bondholders and lender Glencore Energy UK Limited that would allow the Africa-focused energy company to delay a looming debt repayment and boost its liquidity.】

item.title: 美债在PCE数据公布前下跌，美联储鹰派立场与伊朗局势令交易员如坐针毡
item.description: 美国国债价格下跌，因投资者为关键通胀数据发布做准备。本周市场走势受美联储鹰派信号及美伊紧张局势影响，后者推高了油价。【原文：Treasuries fell as investors braced for key US inflation data, capping a week shaped by hawkish signals from the Federal Reserve and tensions between the US and Iran that sent oil prices higher.】

item.title: 终于，低配科技股成为制胜的股票策略
item.description: 多年来，买入美国最大科技股总能带来源源不断的财富——而回避这些股票则注定会沦为失业大军的一员。到了2026年，情况却截然相反。【原文：For years, loading up on the biggest US technology stocks delivered a steady stream of riches — and avoiding them was a surefire ticket to the unemployment rolls. In 2026, the opposite has been true.】

item.title: 科技巨头在人工智能领域的支出激增，正蚕食股票回购计划
item.description: 在多年通过股票回购向投资者输送现金后，大型科技公司正收紧这笔支出，同时竞相将更多资金投入人工智能领域。【原文：After years of funneling cash to investors through stock buybacks, big technology companies are reining in that spending as they race to sink more money into artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 美国特使警告称"欧洲制造"计划将损害盟国防务
item.description: 美国总统特朗普的欧盟事务特使谴责了即将出台的"欧洲制造"计划，警告称该计划可能损害盟国的防务努力，削弱乌克兰对抗俄罗斯的能力。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s envoy to the European Union denounced a forthcoming “Made in Europe” plan, warning that it could damage allies’ defense efforts and weaken Ukraine’s ability to fight Russia.】

item.title: 欧元区工资增长加速，支持欧洲央行对进一步降息持谨慎态度
item.description: 欧元区薪酬增长的关键指标有所加快，这支持了欧洲央行的观点，即目前没有必要进一步降息。【原文：A key measure of euro-area pay growth quickened, supporting the European Central Bank’s view that there’s currently no need to lower interest rates further.】

item.title: 依视路陆逊梯卡遭遇糟糕一周，智能眼镜竞争加剧
item.description: 依视路集团股价正面临近四年最糟糕的一周，苹果公司带来的竞争压力正冲击这家眼镜企业最具前景的增长领域：智能眼镜。【原文：EssilorLuxottica SA shares are on track for their worst week in almost four years as the prospect of competition from Apple Inc. pressures the eyewear company’s most promising growth area: smart glasses.】

item.title: 特朗普称关税促使诺华扩大美国业务
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普总统周三在白宫会见瑞士制药巨头诺华公司首席执行官瓦斯·纳拉辛汉后表示，其关税政策促使诺华扩大了在美国的生产布局。【原文：President Donald Trump said his tariffs spurred Novartis AG to expand its US manufacturing footprint, following a meeting with the Swiss drugmaker’s chief executive Vas Narasimhan at the White House on Wednesday.】

item.title: 杰罗姆·鲍威尔如何让美联储免受特朗普影响
item.description:
美联储主席正采取一系列策略，以巩固这家拥有112年历史的机构的独立性。

【原文：

The Fed chair is deploying strategies to help fortify the 112-year-old institution’s independence.

】

item.title: Tether的USDT将创下FTX崩盘以来最大月度跌幅
item.description: 全球最大稳定币的市值本月正面临显著回调，此前随着亲加密货币的唐纳德·特朗普总统重返白宫，该币种曾持续增长。【原文：The market value of the world’s largest stablecoin is heading for a notable pullback this month, after largely uninterrupted growth since the return of pro-crypto President Donald Trump to the White House.】
